      • find2DPoint

        public TwoDimensionalVector find2DPoint(double x)
        Plugs in the given x coordinate to the line to calculate a 2D point from its equation
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate
        Returns:
        The calculated coordinate. NOTE: y will be the minimum y-value of the line if the slope of the line is undefined
